inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: documented HBeAg negative and anti-HBe positive

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quantitative HBsAg <1,000 IU/ml OR HBV DNA <2x104 IU/mL at screening

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: no evidence of cirrhosis documented by liver biopsy or transient elastography within 6 months

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient has agreed not to take any other investigational drug or systemic anti-viral, cytotoxic, corticosteroid, immunomodulatory agents or Chinese traditional remedies unless clinically indicated

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient is able to give written consent prior to study start and to comply with the study requirements

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: women of childbearing age must have a negative urine (ß-HCG) pregnancy test taken within 14 days of starting therapy

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no evidence of current treatment with nucleoside/nucleotide analogues

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: no clear evidence of cirrhosis documented by liver biopsy or transient elastography (score ≥ 10kpa)

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no evidence of active Co-infection with HIV antibody

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no evidence of active Co-infection with HCV antibody

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no evidence of active Co-infection with HDV antibody positivity

notes: Patient has a history of HCV and recent coinfection with HBV. He is on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.
